statements: SELECT * FROM EventBookings;
SELECT event_name, event_date FROM EventBookings WHERE event_id = 1;
SELECT client_id, event_name, booking_status FROM EventBookings WHERE event_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT event_id, event_name, booking_status FROM EventBookings WHERE client_id = 5;
SELECT * FROM EventBookings WHERE booking_status = 'confirmed';
SELECT * FROM EventBookings WHERE event_date >= '2022-01-01'
SELECT event_name, event_date, client_id FROM EventBookings WHERE booking_status = 'Confirmed' ORDER BY event_date DESC
SELECT DISTINCT event_name FROM EventBookings ORDER BY event_name
SELECT event_id, event_name, event_date, booking_status FROM EventBookings WHERE client_id = 123 ORDER BY event_date ASC
SELECT COUNT(*), booking_status FROM EventBookings GROUP BY booking_status HAVING COUNT(*) > 1
SELECT * FROM event_bookings WHERE client_id = 123;
SELECT event_date, event_time FROM event_bookings WHERE staff_id = 456 ORDER BY event_date DESC;
SELECT client_id, dietary_restrictions FROM client_preferences WHERE client_id = 789;
SELECT * FROM event_bookings WHERE event_date >= '2022-08-10' AND event_time >= '14:00:00';
SELECT * FROM event_bookings WHERE client_id = 987 AND staff_id = 654;
SELECT * FROM event_bookings WHERE client_id = 123;
SELECT event_date, event_time FROM event_bookings WHERE staff_id = 456 ORDER BY event_date DESC;
SELECT client_id, dietary_restrictions FROM client_preferences WHERE dietary_restrictions LIKE '%vegetarian%' AND client_id < 100;
SELECT event_date, event_time FROM event_bookings WHERE client_id = 789 ORDER BY event_date ASC, event_time ASC;
SELECT event_date, COUNT(*) AS event_count FROM event_bookings GROUP BY event_date HAVING event_count > 1;
SELECT * FROM EventBookings;
SELECT event_name, event_date FROM EventBookings ORDER BY event_date DESC;
SELECT client_id, COUNT(event_id) AS events_booked FROM EventBookings GROUP BY client_id;
SELECT * FROM ClientPreferences WHERE preferred_menu = 'Vegetarian' LIMIT 5;

SELECT staff_name, COUNT(event_id) AS events_assigned FROM EventBookings INNER JOIN StaffSchedules ON EventBookings.staff_id = StaffSchedules.staff_id GROUP BY staff_name ORDER BY events_assigned DESC;
SELECT * FROM EventBookings WHERE event_date > '2022-01-01' ORDER BY event_date ASC;
SELECT event_name, client_id FROM EventBookings WHERE staff_id = 'abc123' ORDER BY event_name DESC;
SELECT client_id, preferred_menu FROM ClientPreferences WHERE dietary_restrictions = 'vegetarian';
SELECT staff_name, position FROM StaffSchedules WHERE start_date < '2022-01-01' AND end_date > '2022-02-01';
SELECT client_name, special_requests FROM ClientPreferences WHERE client_id = 'def456';
SELECT * FROM EventBookings WHERE event_date >= '2022-09-15';
SELECT event_name, event_location FROM EventBookings WHERE event_location = 'New York';
SELECT client_name, client_email FROM ClientPreferences WHERE client_email LIKE '%@example.com%';
SELECT item_name, item_price FROM MenuItems WHERE item_category = 'Main Dish';
SELECT staff_name, shift_date, shift_start_time FROM StaffSchedules WHERE staff_id = 101;
SELECT event_name, event_date FROM EventBookings WHERE event_date >= '2022-01-01'
SELECT * FROM ClientPreferences WHERE client_email LIKE '%gmail.com%' OR client_email LIKE '%yahoo.com%'
SELECT staff_name, shift_date, shift_start_time, shift_end_time FROM StaffSchedules WHERE shift_date >= '2022-01-01' ORDER BY shift_date DESC
SELECT item_name, item_price FROM MenuItems WHERE item_category = 'Main Course' ORDER BY item_price ASC
SELECT event_id, event_name, event_location FROM EventBookings WHERE event_date BETWEEN '2022-06-01' AND '2022-07-01'
SELECT * FROM EventBookings;
SELECT event_type, event_date FROM EventBookings WHERE client_id = 1;
SELECT client_name, client_email, client_phone FROM Clients WHERE client_id = 3;
SELECT staff_name, staff_position FROM Staff ORDER BY staff_position DESC;
SELECT food_preferences, drink_preferences, dietary_restrictions FROM ClientPreferences WHERE client_id = 2;
SELECT * FROM EventBookings ORDER BY event_date DESC, event_type ASC;
SELECT client_id, event_date, event_type FROM EventBookings WHERE event_type = 'Conference';
SELECT client_name, client_email, client_phone FROM Clients WHERE client_id IN (SELECT client_id FROM EventBookings WHERE event_type = 'Wedding');
SELECT staff_name, staff_position FROM Staff WHERE staff_position IN ('Manager', 'Coordinator') ORDER BY staff_name ASC;

SELECT e.booking_id, c.client_name, s.staff_name FROM EventBookings e INNER JOIN Clients c ON e.client_id = c.client_id INNER JOIN Staff s ON c.client_id = s.staff_id WHERE e.event_date >= '2022-01-01';
